# includeDocumentData

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the sample includes the full document’s data.

## Declaration

```swift
var includeDocumentData: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the value passed to the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentQuery/init(documentType:predicate:limit:sortDescriptors:includeDocumentData:resultsHandler:)] method’s `includeDocumentData` parameter.

## Accessing the Document Query’s Properties

- **limit**: The maximum number of documents the receiver will return upon completion.
- **sortDescriptors**: An array of sort descriptors that specify the order of the results returned by this query.
